title: VOID a Calculation
when_to_do: When a payment cannot be approved if calculation status not SUCCEEDED
steps: Create a new git branch in the db_prod_scripts repo
create a DB script to mark the calculations VOIDED
create a DB script to mark the calculations APPROVED
Once the Pull Request is approved have the DB team run the script to VOID the calculation
Have the DB team run the script to return the calculation to APPROVE status
